verbose_text: To further elucidate the mechanisms responsible for hearing loss, RT-qPCR was used to examine the miR-29b, SIRT1 and PGC-1alpha mRNA expression levels in the cochleae of young and aged C57BL/6 mice, while the protein expression levels of SIRT1 and PGC-1alpha were examined by western blot analysis.
evidence: SIRT1 and PGC-1alpha mRNA expression levels
